=== Summary ===

Clamav and spamassassin are popular products used on mail server. They should be part of the main repository ready to be integrated in a mail server. For clamav, not all binaries need to be promoted.  The specific use case driving promotion is integration with amavisd-new for mail scanning.  Amavisd-new suggests clamav and clamav-daemon.  This will require clamav-base, clamav-freshclam, and libclamav to also be promoted.  The remaining clamav binaries can stay in Universe.

=== Release Note ===

Clamav-daemon (clamd) and spamassassin are available in the main repository.

=== Rationale ===

Clamav and spamassassin are popular products used on mail server and help fight viruses and spams. They should be part of the main repository.

=== Use Cases ===
* Dan deploys a new mail server with the mail server task from the ubuntu server cd. He can install clamav and spamassin for anti-virus scanning and spam protection.
